description: A playful nod to the British love for tea and queuing.
title: Tea Queue
n_1: A cold, blustery day outside a London café.
c2_1: Let's find the best winter activity inside.
n_2: Inside, a long queue snakes towards the counter.
c1_2: Looks like we're not the only ones with the idea.
n_3: They join the queue, chatting and laughing.
c1_3: Nothing beats queueing for a warm cuppa.
n_4: With tea in hand, they gaze out at the snow.
c2_4: All it took was a queue and some tea!
